website_summaries.verdict: Small and basic, but perfectly fine for a handful of bats. A good budget choice.
pros: We love the grooved walls that make it easier for bats to enter and roost
cons: Some users report the craftsmanship isn't on par with more costly models

customer_reviews.title: Cheap craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 3, really hoping to improve the bat population around our area. When they arrived the wood looked nice, however all of the seems were splitting apart (my husband thinks they were made with wet wood) we added 3 nails to each side including the top. The way they were made, I highly doubt they'd be strong enough to survive a few years in the weather. Unfortunately, we will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Affordable Bat House
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the bat house was designed and built including the detail in the roof and slits for the bats to grab. The craftsmanship is well done. The stain should help the pine last for awhile. I hung it up at my pumphouse right under the roof about 10 feet up. I had to screw in the bottom portion because it wasn't flush screwing down with the mounting hardware provided at the top.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Needs sealed to protect from outdoor elements.
customer_reviews.text: Overall well constructed but it’s not sealed so very susceptible to weather. It recommends you don’t mount directly on the building but use some kind of spacer to prevent bat poo from getting on the structure. This could easily be added option to the design of the bat box. If I had the skills and material to do this I probably would have just built the box myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jaidion

customer_reviews.title: Good craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bat house. It has good craftsmanship. It is "true" does not have sloppy woodwork. Was packed well and arrived on time. I haven't used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Cicon

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as advertised and was what I was looking for. To me was the best choice from among the listed options. Much of what I read said gonwith a bag house that is pine rather than cedar since it takes time For the smell to dissipate. Can’t report any bats yet but it has only been installed for one week. Used their bat attractant spray too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: so i really like this..
customer_reviews.text: so i really like this.. but its def smaller than i'd have thought.. i plan on painting it and putting it up soon.. Seems well made and a great value compared to others.. will update when i see how many bats i get.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Craftsmanship is great
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved this Bat House. It was easy to mount and the little steps are too cute.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Luckett

customer_reviews.title: wood warping may not last long
customer_reviews.text: I painted this to protect it. i see after 1 month that the bottom flat is starting to warp. not sure how long this will last. no bats yet. i kicked 18 out of my attic so I know some were looking for a home.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Solid Wooden Bat House
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully constructed. It was ready to be hung. It is made of high quality wood.
customer_reviews.author: jvangeest

customer_reviews.title: Craftsmanship not good, roof should be one solid piece but its ...
customer_reviews.text: Craftsmanship not good, roof should be one solid piece but its 4 pieces of wood nailed down with brads. There is an obvious gap between two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Good construction.
customer_reviews.text: This bat house is very well constructed and, I think, well priced, too. I am looking forward to installing it at my summer home when spring is here.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette C. Perpich

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the $. Installed on a tall pole and they moved in after I blocked them off from getting into my soffit on the house.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the product. We have not yet hung it up but plan to in about a month. Excited to see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: SCN1996

customer_reviews.title: Nice house
customer_reviews.text: Well built bat house. I just mounted it on my shop and am hoping that it will house a bar very shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time and ready to go. i decided to apply a waterproofing to it although the wood should repel water naturally. otherwise ready to install. would recommend to a friend..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: It was perfectly described and built to last. I did some wood burning on it to personalize it for a gift. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal  Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!!! I was surprised how nice it is since the price is so affordable. I would definitely recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: katie argueta

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality. Lower than junk.
customer_reviews.text: Poor construction unlikely to last long enough for the bats to establish.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: The bat box is well made and seems sturdy. We have painted it black to help with warmth and make it less obvious on the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Nice little house.
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven't put it up yet (winter), it looks well built and sturdy. We'll see if the bats like it come spring.
customer_reviews.author: trafick

customer_reviews.title: Starter Bat House
customer_reviews.text: Like that it was pre-constructed, and it comes with a hanging tab.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great little bat house.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to paint and hang. Watching for the bats to start using it. We think it looks like a lifeguard tower in the desert. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Lorri

customer_reviews.title: Bat House
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I bought a Bat House! It is really nice looking & sturdy! I hope the bats will like it & use it!

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Outside is varnished
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Outside is varnished, so it will be harder to color it black to absorb light. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Hemple Carlis

customer_reviews.title: Real word and excellent construction
customer_reviews.text: They used very good materials excellent workmanship and design very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly described and arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: This Bat house is a gift for a friend... something she has been wanting for the area behind her house. It arrived in perfect condition and as described by the seller ...also arrived on schedule .
customer_reviews.author: violet

customer_reviews.title: Not great craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it will work, but I wish I didnt have to fix it before installing it. The wood roof was coming apart on arrival

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: so far no bats but i love this house so far

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy, and well made...can't wait to see the bats come back, to have less mosquitoes around the back yard!

customer_reviews.title: simple perfect bat house
customer_reviews.text: Bat house was exactly as described. It is a simple pine house and if you read about bats, this house is exactly what they want for a home.
customer_reviews.author: matthew l.

customer_reviews.title: Just bought
customer_reviews.text: We toke space from nature, this is a way to apologize
customer_reviews.author: marco caglioni

customer_reviews.title: Well built, great product, Good company.
customer_reviews.text: Well built, fantastic product. Very professional company. Would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Habart

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built,good looking bat house.I haven't had it up long enough for bats to move in yet.I'm satisfied with my purchase.The wood is thick enough to reinforce with screws if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles WV

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly the way the picture showed. Built very well. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: The bat house arrived on time and in good condition. I'll probably paint it before I put it up so that it doesn't stand out like a beacon against our dark house. It looks sturdy enough to get a few seasons of use.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Newton

customer_reviews.title: Bats will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully constructed. Very sturdy. I know the bats will love it in the spring. Thank you for your very quick service of a wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: Amyla Nessinski

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Just painted and put these up. Should help with flying insects!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Bat House
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, the Bat Houses are fantastic!!! We live out in the mountains and had 2 different ones a few years ago. We loved to sit at dusk at we could actually watch and count the bats as they left the houses. I bought these for my mom for Mother’s Day and she absolutely loves them!!! The craftsmanship and light wood of boxes is just beautiful. They are just perfect. I was surprised, pleasantly, that they were less expensive than ones we had, and when we got them I was very pleased with how beautiful and perfect they were!!! We are putting them up today for the dusk bat show this evening, I will send a video!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan K

customer_reviews.title: bat house
customer_reviews.text: I haven't install this yet, but it seems nicely put together and sturdy. Plus the shipping was quick!
customer_reviews.author: David S. Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift to attract bats. They eat lots of bugs!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, these have not fallen yet (they are outside in the WI summer currently - we have had several summer storms and they are still in place). I have yet to see any bats use them yet.. (only reason they are 4 star and not 5 star). They are in the sun and have been up for a good three months now (away from human activity). We'll see what the future brings..
customer_reviews.author: S. Teal

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built, and goid price.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't pay attention to the measurements when I ordered, so it was smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia j. biarnesen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived extremely fast! within 24 hrs Attracting bats! Muchos thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jim p.

customer_reviews.title: but I like the construction
customer_reviews.text: Simple made but solid and my first bat box. I can't say the bats are attracted yet, but I like the construction.

customer_reviews.title: Works great to get rid of mosquitoes!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and the color blends in well in our yard setting.
customer_reviews.author: Maggiemay

customer_reviews.title: The bat house is fine although I do not know how it would hold ...
customer_reviews.text: The bat house is fine although I do not know how it would hold up in the pacific northwest weather outside, it got broken in shipping, it wasn’t wrapped at all, so I will be sending it back but as a bat house itself I think it’s fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Hammargren

customer_reviews.title: As I had hoped they would be
customer_reviews.text: Now I wait to see if it works, which I believe it will.

customer_reviews.title: smaller than i thought
customer_reviews.text: Its fine, but smaller than what I thought it would be.

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a bathouse!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and have them hanging on my shed. I hope they look as beautiful to the bats as they look to me!

customer_reviews.title: Bat House
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product...blends in well with our backyard and trees. Looking forward to the bats making it their home.

customer_reviews.text: No bats the first year, but it is a great looking product. It seems pretty sturdily made.

customer_reviews.title: No bats yet.
customer_reviews.text: A whole lot smaller than expected but hopefully it will work

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comes with hook attachment.
customer_reviews.text: Already assembled with hook, easy to put on post. Just what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Watkins

customer_reviews.title: If I was a bat, I'd move in!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely constructed, not too big, not too expensive. It did not come with any instructions/suggestions about how/where to mount it for greatest likelihood of attracting bats, but that info was easily found online. I don't expect to actually house a bat for a while (it takes time) but I am optimistic this house will eventually make a very happy home.
customer_reviews.author: OptimalAnimals

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: good quality, should weather well. fast shipping was also appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: ... days in the sun the roof turned sideways - terrible craftsmanship. The crack is almost 1/2 inch on ...
customer_reviews.text: hung it up - after 3 days in the sun the roof turned sideways - terrible craftsmanship. The crack is almost 1/2 inch on both sides. O focuses no bat would want to go in there now.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband, he was very happy with the product, score!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great box for the money
customer_reviews.text: I chose this box, because it is a simple box and a reasonable price. It was easy to hang (1 screw), it was a windy day when we hung it so we added a second screw to the bottom to steady it more.
customer_reviews.author: SC n SC

customer_reviews.title: I bough two of these to hang on our fence ...
customer_reviews.text: I bough two of these to hang on our fence in the back yard - I kind of wanted to attract bats to help with the mosquito population. To be honest, I am not sure if there are actually bats living in them myself, but my husband said he thinks they are. Either way something is living there! And for that reason these houses do serve their purpose!
customer_reviews.author: KaitieMarie

customer_reviews.title: very easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described, very easy to hang. Now just have to wait for the bats to arrive

customer_reviews.title: its also pretty
customer_reviews.text: Its okay, I hung it about a week ago and have not had any bats in it, make sure you hang it about 15- 18 feet off the ground, and caulk the sides and roof, and also paint it, its also pretty small

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: satisfied. Nailed in

product_meta.title: Evergreen Natural Wood Outdoor Safe Single Chamber BAT HOUSE - Natural Pesticide and Bug Control - Ready to Mount - 9”W x 5”D x 13.5”H
feature_bullets: ECO FRIENDLY WAY FOR YOUR GARDEN TO FLOURISH: Nasty chemicals have no place in your garden oasis. Instead, help the friendly bat population survive. Many bat species eat vast amounts of insects, including some of the most damaging agricultural pests. Mosquitoes are a particular favorite among bats, some of which are said to eat up to 1,200 mosquitoes in one hour! That alone should be reason enough to put a bat house in your backyard.

CUTIES NOT SPOOKY: Most bats have very cute faces, some even resemble deer, rabbits, and little Chihuahuas! These cuties help your flora flourish naturally by pollinating plants and taking care of nasty bugs during their nocturnal routine.

POLLINATION STATION: These nocturnal creatures become active when the sun goes down, and work magic in your garden during the night. They go after the nectar and bugs, spreading pollen as they fly. Many bat species eat vast amounts of insects, including some of the most damaging agricultural pests.

BEAUTIFUL IN ANY OASIS: Crafted from humidity controlled natural wood. The rustic look and unique bat shape cut-out make this the perfect addition whether your taste is modern, rustic, farmhouse or industrial! And, as most bats can see just as well as humans, they can appreciate this beautiful item too!
EASY TO USE & A GREAT SIZE: Ready to Mount! - 9"W x 5"D x 13.5"H Fits in anywhere!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars266 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
